{{dcl|since=c++17|num=1|1=
bool operator==( const std::pmr::memory_resource&amp; a,
                 const std::pmr::memory_resource&amp; b ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|until=c++20|num=2|1=
bool operator!=( const std::pmr::memory_resource&amp; a,
                 const std::pmr::memory_resource&amp; b ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares the {{tt|memory_resource}}s {{c|a}} and {{c|b}} for equality. Two {{tt|memory_resource}}s compare equal if and only if memory allocated from one {{tt|memory_resource}} can be deallocated from the other and vice versa.

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

=== Return value ===
@1@ {{c|1=&amp;a == &amp;b {{!!}} a.is_equal(b)}}
@2@ {{c|1=!(a == b)}}
